description: We‚Äôre a customized beauty brand at the intersection of tech and beauty, setting out to democratize custom beauty and truly empower individuality. There‚Äôs no one size fits all with us.

How it works
## Two Steps to Custom Haircare
  1. You take a quick, two-minute quiz about your hair history, goals, damage and styling habits. 
  2. We formulate made-to-order, tailored haircare, prioritizing naturally-derived ingredients, and ship it to you.


[Take the Quiz](http://www.functionofbeauty.com/</pages/hair-quiz>)

## The Function Standard
With Function of Beauty, you are guaranteed a highly efficacious formula with no compromises. Always clean, vegan, and cruelty-free, our formulas focus on naturally-derived ingredients and powerful science to meet high efficacy and testing standards.

generated_description:
**Function of Beauty** is a customized beauty brand that launched in 2015 as part of Y Combinator's W16 batch. Positioning itself at the crossroads of technology and beauty, the company aims to democratize personalized beauty solutions. The mission is clear: there‚Äôs no universal answer to beauty, and they empower individuality through tailored products for hair, skin, and body care.

Based in New York City, Function of Beauty is home to a vibrant team of 300 employees and led by Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner. They focus on cutting-edge, data-backed formulations that prioritize customer uniqueness. Their products are clean, vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated with naturally-derived ingredients to ensure efficacy.

Customers begin their journey with Function of Beauty by taking a two-minute quiz that assesses hair, body, or skin profiles. This sets the stage for a customized product experience, offering made-to-order solutions that provide specific benefits based on individual needs. Whether addressing damaged hair, skincare concerns, or body care requirements, Function of Beauty strives to ensure that the cosmetics they offer reflect the client‚Äôs unique beauty story.

Their product lineup includes custom haircare, skincare, and bodycare formulas, with special attention on new offerings like the "Ultimate Hair Repair Trio" available at major retail partners including Sephora, Target, and Amazon. This integration of e-commerce with personalization has set Function of Beauty apart in the beauty landscape.

If customized, personalized beauty engagements capture your audience, Function of Beauty opens the door. Discover more at [Function of Beauty's website](http://www.functionofbeauty.com).
